SAMPLE_CLASSIFICATION: Environmental > Terrestrial > Soil > Unclassified > Tropical rainforest
GEO_LOC_NAME: Puerto Rico; Luquillo Experimental Forest, Bisley watershed
BIOME: Tropical and subtropical moist broadleaf forest biome
NUCLEIC_ACID_EXTRACTION: modified CTAB method, described in Brodie etal 2006, Appl Environ Microbiol 72:6288-6298
SAMPLE_DESCRIPTION: Soil metagenome extracted from rainforest soil. The tropical forest soil sample used for metagenome sequencing was collected in a subtropical lower montane wet forest in the Luquillo Experimental Forest (18.30N, 65.83W), which is part of the NSF-sponsored Long-Term Ecological Research program in Puerto Rico. The climate in this region is relatively aseasonal, with mean annual rainfall of 4500 mm and mean annual temperatures of 22C to 24C. Soils were collected from the Bisley watershed approximately 250 meters above sea level from the 0-10 cm depth using a 2.5 cm diameter soil corer. Sampling date: Summer 2008

SAMPLE_MATERIAL_PROCESSING: prefiltration through a 1.6 um 144 mm glass fibre filter; filtrate then passed through a 0.22 um Sterivex cartirdge
NUCLEIC_ACID_EXTRACTION: Refer to Gilbert et al 2008 - doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0003042

SAMPLE_CLASSIFICATION: Host-associated > Human > Digestive system > Large intestine > Fecal
SAMPLE_DESCRIPTION: Sample Characteristics - The MOAFTS twin cohort, comprised of female likesex twin pairs, were identified from Missouri birth records over the period 1994-1999,when the twins had a median age of 15 years. A total of 350 twins from the larger MOAFTS cohort completed screening interviews for the present study. We were able to take advantage of the wave five interview of the MOAFTS twin cohort (which has 90% retention of wave four participants) to identify pairs most likely to meet study criteria.Eligibility was then confirmed at screening interview.

SAMPLE_MATERIAL_PROCESSING: melt ice and filter through 0.2um whatman filter
MISC_PARAM_1: chemical composition of melted water: As <0.01mg, Pb 0.022mg, Ca 4.7mg, Fe <0.02mg, K 1.1mg, Cu 0.122mg, Mg 0.23mg, Mn 0.083, Na 2.4mg, Ni 0.007mg, Zn 0.81mg
SAMPLE_DESCRIPTION: 454 Sequencing of The Glacier Ice Metagenome Of The Northern Schneeferner
